This `LinearLayout` layout or its `LinearLayout` parent is unnecessary
Hardcoded string "✨ About Maria Volkova", should use `@string` resource

Hardcoded string "Maria is a kind and determined girl who dreams of a brighter future. Despite facing challenges, she remains strong and resilient. 
 
📚 She loves books and creativity. Maria dreams of riding through the park 🌳, feeling the wind on her face and experiencing a sense of freedom. 
 
She works hard at school because she aspires to become a teacher 🍎 and help other children like herself. 
 
 Maria believes in friendship 🤝 and kindness, always supporting those around her. 
 
 Although Maria has no family, she believes she can pave her own path and make the world a better place through education and compassion.", should use `@string` resource
